description: Numbers n such that sum of digits of n^2 is a square.
links: Bruno Berselli, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
example: 6^2 = 36 and 3+6 = 9 is a square. 13^2 = 169 and 1+6+9 = 16 is a square.
maple: readlib(issqr): f := []: for n from 1 to 200 do if issqr(convert(convert(n^2,base,10),`+`)) then f := [op(f), n] fi; od; f;
prog: (MAGMA) [ n: n in [1..185] | IsSquare(&+Intseq(n^2)) ];  // _Bruno Berselli_, Jul 29 2011(PARI) is(n)=n=eval(Vec(Str(n^2)));issquare(sum(i=1,#n,n[i])) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jul 29 2011(Python)from gmpy2 import is_squareA061910 = [n for n in range(1,10**3) if is_square(sum(int(d) for d in str(n*n)))] # _Chai Wah Wu_, Sep 03 2014
author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), May 17 2001
